XenotypeDef.label: antment
XenotypeDef.description: The Antment were discovered thriving underground across a suprising number of unique rim worlds. Their origin and plans are a mystery to most. Could they be controlled by some kind of queen, or is the resemblance to ants just a coincidence?
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The Antment are great miners, and prefer warmer climates. Their small red bodies are very efficient at recycling toxins.

XenotypeDef.label: pincoid
XenotypeDef.description: The Pincoid are xenos who seemed to have split off of their red Antment brothers and decided to settle down and build cities. They are more technoligcally advanced than their red brothers.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The Pincoid are proficient at crafting and building, but have lost the toxic resistance and mining abilities of their Antment ancestors.
